price: Àti pé mo ní ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kan lọ́rùn lọ́dọ̀ wọn. Nítorí náà, mò ń bẹ̀rù pé wọ́n máa pa mí.”
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
